name: Roll-volver
des: Cowboys' conventional weapon, suitable for fast shooting, with stable Damage and average Hit Rate.

name: Ruff Rifle
des: Long-range strike weapon, suitable for accurate shooting, moderate Damage and high Hit Rate.

name: Double Ruff
des: Powerful explosive weapon with high Damage and low Hit Rate.

name: Pawfect Hat
des: A fashionable hat that can protect against the wind and rain.

name: Furrward Boots
des: Trendy and durable boots suitable for outdoor adventure.

name: Pawsh Cloak
des: Weatherproof clothes which says a lot about the wearer’s fashion sense.

name: Pawsome Cigar
des: Highly popular among the early adventurers for its refreshing effect.

name: Devil's Claw
des: Good for self-defense or sneak attack, can also be used as a throwing weapon.

name: Pawlice Badge
des: An object helps the wearer to gain people’s trust easily.
